item.title: 德国失业率增幅超预期，抑制经济反弹希望
item.description: 德国失业率的增长超出预期，凸显了欧洲最大经济体今年只能逐步复苏的预期。【原文：German unemployment rose more than anticipated — underscoring expectations that Europe’s biggest economy will recover only gradually this year.】

item.title: 大选局势紧张，亚洲十大跌幅股票均来自印度
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）可能以低于预期的票数获胜，这导致印度股市大跌，对亚洲股市造成了影响。【原文：The selloff in Indian stocks in the wake of a possibly narrower-than-expected victory for Prime Minister Narendra Modi has weighed on the broader Asian market.】

item.title: 交易员等待美国数据和欧洲央行决议，欧洲股市下跌
item.description: 在繁忙的一周到来之前，欧洲股市下跌，投资者在等待美国经济数据的同时，也在期待周四欧洲央行的决定。【原文：European stocks fell ahead of a busy week, with investors awaiting US economic data while looking forward to Thursday’s European Central Bank decision.】

item.title: 马士基认为红海中断对世界贸易影响更深
item.description: 作为全球贸易的风向标，A.P. Moller-Maersk A/S公司表示，红海拥堵造成的连锁反应对全球供应线的影响超过了此前的预期。【原文：A.P. Moller-Maersk A/S, a bellwether for global trade, said the world’s supply lines are more impacted than previously expected by the ripple effects coming from the congestion in the Red Sea.】

item.title: 韩国为 "价值提升 "辩护，本土股市表现落后
item.description: 韩国最高金融监管机构试图捍卫国家为提高股票价值所做努力的有效性，并承诺根除给当地市场造成压力的所谓 "僵尸企业"。【原文：South Korea’s top financial watchdog sought to defend the effectiveness of the nation’s efforts to boost stock value, pledging to root out so-called zombie firms that weigh on local markets.】

item.title: 瑞士通胀达到 2024 年高点，削弱了瑞士央行降息的理由
item.description: 瑞士通胀率保持了今年以来的最快速度，削弱了瑞士国家银行在本月晚些时候召开的官员会议上降息的可能性。【原文：Swiss inflation held at its fastest pace this year, eroding the case for a Swiss National Bank interest-rate cut when officials meet later this month.】

item.title: Blackstone 将以 5.8 亿英镑从 Vistry 购买 1,750 套住宅
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 和 Regis Group Plc 已达成一项交易，从英国住宅建筑商 Vistry Group Plc 收购 1,750 套住宅组合。【原文：Blackstone Inc. and Regis Group Plc have agreed a deal to buy a portfolio of 1,750 homes from UK homebuilder Vistry Group Plc.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数有望延续跌势
item.description: 伦敦城。摄影师：Mike Kemp/Getty Images【原文：The City of London. Photographer: Mike Kemp/Getty Images】

item.title: 分析师称，萨博 385% 的涨幅看起来像是在飙升
item.description: 萨博公司两年来的股价涨势可能会逐渐消失，因为人们担心这家瑞典防务公司的估值过高，而且最近又提醒人们一些预期订单将会落空。【原文：Saab AB’s two-year stock rally may be fizzling out amid concerns over the Swedish defense company’s lofty valuation and a recent reminder that some anticipated orders will fall through.】

item.title: 空中客车公司正在洽谈向中国出售 100 多架宽体飞机事宜
item.description: 空中客车公司（Airbus SE）正在就向中国出售 A330neo 大型客机进行谈判，自习近平主席上月访问法国总统马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）以来，谈判势头日益强劲。【原文：Airbus SE is negotiating a major sale of A330neo aircraft to China, with talks gaining momentum since President Xi Jinping visited his French counterpart Emmanuel Macron last month.】

item.title: 投资者押注祖马下台，联合政府将由民主党执政，兰特因此上涨
item.description: 投资者希望南非能在未来 13 天的联合会谈中产生一个对市场友好的政府，这推动了南非资产的反弹。【原文：South African assets are rebounding, fueled by investor hopes that the country will emerge from the next 13 days of coalition talks with a market-friendly government.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 澳大利亚首次发行绿色债券获得罕见溢价
item.description: 澳大利亚首次发行的主权绿色债券获得了溢价，因为投资者被该国可信的框架和发行更多债券的计划所吸引。【原文：Australia commanded a premium for its first sovereign green bond, as investors were drawn by the nation’s credible framework and plan to issue more debt.】

item.title: 混沌市场与墨西哥、莫迪和曼德拉相遇
item.description:
投资者喜欢印度，惧怕辛鲍姆，并对谁加入南非联盟拭目以待。【原文：

Investors love India, fear Sheinbaum, and are holding their breath over whoever joins a coalition in South Africa. 

】

item.title: 英国企业危机愈演愈烈
item.description:
保守党的政绩因股市停滞不前、英国公司被外资收购以及缺乏可替代这些公司的上市公司而受到损害。【原文：

The Conservatives’ record is marred by a stagnant stock market, foreign takeovers of British firms and a dearth of listings to replace them.

】

item.title: 伊恩-布雷默称美国是 "沸锅中的青蛙
item.description:
欧亚集团创始人告诉 在城市 为什么极端事件的常态化 会使即将到来的美国大选中的暴力事件更有可能发生。【原文：

The Eurasia Group founder tells In the City why normalization of extreme events will make violence in the coming US election more likely.

】

item.title: 欧洲央行首次降息前预期开始破灭
item.description: 强劲的经济数据和欧洲央行鹰派的声音促使一些分析师和投资者动摇了今年降息的预期。【原文：Strong economic data and vocal European Central Bank hawks are pushing some analysts and investors to waver in their expectations for interest-rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 海湾地区开始出现新的俄罗斯贸易热点
item.description: 俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京本周将在圣彼得堡举行的年度论坛上发表演讲，届时他的国家与一个低调的海湾国家的商业关系将得到充分展示。【原文：When Russian President Vladimir Putin takes the stage at his annual forum in St. Petersburg this week, his country’s business ties with a lower-key Gulf state will be on full display.】

item.title: 丹斯克预计2024年挪威降息次数将减少，原因是工资风险和经济形势
item.description: 丹斯克银行（Danske Bank A/S）的分析师说，挪威央行今年的降息次数可能会比早些时候推测的少，理由是工资增长高于预期，经济衰退的风险降低。【原文：Analysts at Danske Bank A/S said Norway’s central bank will probably make fewer interest-rate cuts this year than presumed earlier, citing higher-than-expected wage growth and a lower risk of recession.】

item.title: 菲律宾央行拒绝了削弱比索的降息呼吁
item.description: 菲律宾央行行长伊莱-雷莫洛纳（Eli Remolona）对该国财政部长提出的降息前景进行了回击，认为其 "过于激进"。【原文：Philippine central bank Governor Eli Remolona pushed back against the rate cut outlook given by the country’s finance chief, describing it as “too aggressive.”】

item.title: 房地产市场回暖，中国万科销售下滑势头缓解
item.description: 中国万科股份有限公司（China Vanke Co., Ltd.）的销售下滑在 5 月份有所缓解，因为房地产市场情绪的解冻提振了这家国家支持的开发商，使其成为全国房地产危机的焦点。【原文：China Vanke Co.’s sales slump moderated in May, as a thaw in housing market sentiment boosted the state-backed developer that’s become a focus of the nation’s property crisis.】

item.title: 香港警告天安门事件周年纪念将带来安全威胁
item.description: 在北京天安门广场镇压事件 35 周年之际，香港领导人强调有必要维护国家安全，这表明即使没有公开抗议活动，政府也打算继续镇压异议人士。【原文：Hong Kong’s leader stressed a need to safeguard national security on the 35th anniversary of the Tiananmen Square crackdown in Beijing, signaling the government’s intent to continue a clampdown on dissent even in the absence of open protests.】

item.title: 沙特首次公开募股铸就新财富，医生之子成为亿万富翁
item.description: 长期以来，沙特阿拉伯一直依靠石油和与石油相关的业务创造财富。随着新商业帝国的蓬勃发展，这种情况正在发生巨大变化。【原文：Saudi Arabia has long churned out fortunes built on oil and the business surrounding it. That’s changing dramatically as new business empires boom.】

item.title: 降息希望激发各地对债券的需求
item.description: 由于对美联储提前降息的押注增强了主权债务的吸引力，全球债券周二反弹，与隔夜美国国债的涨势相呼应。【原文：Global bonds rallied Tuesday, echoing overnight gains in US Treasuries, as bets for an early Federal Reserve interest-rate cut bolstered the appeal of sovereign debt.】

item.title: 中国股市反弹引发企业融资热潮
item.description: 中国企业正急于利用近期股市反弹的机会筹集资金，这可能是市场再次动荡前的一个狭窄窗口。【原文：Chinese companies are rushing to take advantage of a recent equities rebound to raise funds, using what may be a narrow window before the market falters again.】

item.title: 必和必拓 490 亿美元收购英吉利失败后面临耐心考验
item.description: 在必和必拓集团（BHP Group）以 490 亿美元收购较小的竞争对手英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）失败几天后，投资者对首席执行官迈克-亨利（Mike Henry）只有一个忠告：保持冷静。【原文：Days after BHP Group failed to secure the $49 billion takeover of smaller rival Anglo American Plc, investors have one message for Chief Executive Mike Henry — keep your cool.】

item.title: 投资者等待大选结果，印度股票期货上涨
item.description: 印度股票期货上涨，延续了周一的大涨势头，投资者在等待周末结束的为期六周的马拉松式选举的最终结果。【原文：India’s stock futures rose, extending Monday’s surge, as investors awaited the final result of the marathon six-week election that concluded over the weekend.】

item.title: 贝莱德聘请杰富瑞的陈先生领导东南亚私人信贷业务
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：BlackRock Inc. has named Yik Ley Chan to lead the firm’s private credit efforts in Southeast Asia, the latest high-level personnel move in the opaque and rapidly growing debt market.】

item.title: 麦格理称中国债券之争吸取了 SVB 危机的教训
item.description: 据麦格理集团（Macquarie Group Ltd.）称，中国正在从美国硅谷银行（Silicon Valley Bank）的崩溃中吸取教训，与本地债券牛市作斗争。【原文：China is drawing lessons from Silicon Valley Bank’s meltdown in the US as it battles local bond bulls, according to Macquarie Group Ltd.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Dymon 逆势扩建香港中环办事处
item.description: 对冲基金公司戴蒙亚洲资本（Dymon Asia Capital）正在香港中央商务区进行扩张，而此时香港正面临着创纪录的高档写字楼空置率和租金下降问题。【原文：Hedge fund firm Dymon Asia Capital is expanding in Hong Kong’s central business district, at a time when the city is seeing record premium office vacancies and declining rental rates.】
